items.title: Tesla Awards CEO Musk Millions of Shares Valued at About $29 Billion
items.description: The move comes just six months after a judge ordered Tesla to revoke Musk’s massive pay package.

items.title: 3 Tiny Behaviors That Make You the Calmest Person in the Room

items.title: Use Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s 1 Simple Trick to Get the Best Answers From AI
items.description: The Nvidia chief has a front-row seat for the AI revolution. Here’s how he gets the best answers from AI tools.

items.title: The Labor Market Confirms That the Fed Has Made a Policy Error
items.description: Economic data makes Jerome Powell’s patience look like a mistake.
